channel.title: How Do I jar a Client? Please Help me
channel.description:
Hey I need to know exactly how to jar a bluurrs client so i can put it on my site iv'e been trying for 2 weeks now but i just can't get it. So if someone can please Give me step by step instructions or tell me what i need to do in a comment that would be Great... And Also, Do i need to jar certian files or the whole client because iv'e been jarring the whole thing Please Help !
Jdog7296

go to google: search for “jar-maker” download it.
then go to youtube and seach “how to jar and sign a client” and i think its the first video that comes up.
